name: SocialAd
tag_list: sebastian-fumagalli, horacio-cairoli, social-media, social-media-monitoring, socialad, social-media-performance, performance
overview:
SocialAd

Social Monitoring + Social Performance + Social Management.

SocialAd design and develop communication strategies in Social Networks and Online Communities.

We help advertisers to engage consumers integrating brands in a non-invasive and highly effective way.

SocialAd develop business strategies, supported by a technology platform, business rules, workflow, processes & social characteristics, designed to engage the customer in a collaborative conversation in order to provide mutually beneficial value in a trusted & transparent business environment.
